price: But the devils plunge their [human] brothers deeper into sin, sparing no effort.
arabic: وَإِخۡوَٰنُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغَيِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقۡصِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
